title: Captain James T. Kirk
subtitle: Captain of the U.S.S. Enterprise
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html: The Green in Captain Kirk's image shows he is decisive and has a strong preference for being logical.
card_first_person_html: The profiles of the three main characters in Star Trek were among the first I did back in the 1980s.
